name: 阿尔沃行动
abstract: 《阿尔沃行动》是一款全新的拟真VR FPS游戏，它专门为VR设计，为你提供惊险刺激的VR FPS战斗体验。

detail.app_languages: Traditional Chinese, Russian, Portuguese, French, Spanish, German, Japanese, English, Simplified Chinese
detail.app_release_note:
- Added customizable weapon offsets.
- Added mute own microphone button.
- Improved start-up sequence.
- Reduced the total time of a Hardpoint match.
- Fixed hands disappearing on auto-rifle setup if you respawn before a dropped gun disappears.
- Killstreaks and grenades shown while empty handed or holding the SND bomb.
- Bayonet deals no damage if owner is dead.
- Minimap and other game prompts are visible while empty handed.
- Fixed docked magazine on rifle disappearing after toggling on static while dual wielding.
- Fixed crash after changing from motion to auto-rifle then dying.
- Fixed ability to fire some dropped weapons when dead on auto-rifle setup.
- Friendly names and chevrons visible at all times while dead.
- Backrooms in Sanatorium are only activated if all levers are pulled by different people.
- Fixed zombie projectile ball getting stuck mid-air.
- Fixed fall damage on SND taking you to the last spawn.
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO Neo3 Pro, PICO Neo3, PICO Neo3 Eye, PICO 4, PICO 4 Pro
